description:
1.1prefinal 2002081422 Mac OS 9.0.4 NuBus

file>open location
ftp://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla/nightly/latest/mozilla-mac-trunk-stub.bin

what happens: a dialog "Downloading mozilla-mac-trunk-stub.bin"

It suggests: Open using _StuffIt Expanderª_ (bug 163141)

ie4.5:
tested in mac ie4.5, the ftp listing labels the file as "MacBinary", and by the
time mac ie has saved the file (to the desktop), it was a StuffIt5 Archive
[SIT5SIT!] -- MacIE launched StuffIt and asked it to decode the MacBinary file.

what should happen: mozilla should decode macbinary automatically, like ie.
summary: Automatically decode MacBinary and BinHex files like Mac IE
